## Projection.worldExtent() method

Returns the world extents in world coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract worldExtent<Bounds extends Box3Like>(minElevation: number, maxElevation: number, result?: Bounds): Bounds;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  minElevation | number | The minimum elevation in meters. |
|  maxElevation | number | The maximum elevation in meters. |
|  result | Bounds | The optional object that will be used to create the resulting bounding box. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Bounds
